name: The Unders_core
description:
Check out the Steam page to follow the updates and help the game grow! Join the Discord community and share your thoughts!

The Unders_core is a reimagined roguelike deckbuilding experience.

Set in a sci-fi world, the game is centered around two decks – one for fighting and one for exploring.

This allows you to try out more combinations and discover unexpected synergies every run.

Main highlights:

 – The game has minimal randomness within cards and character actions. No cards like “do 1 to 5 damage on a rainy day, no dodges, no random criticals”

 – Two separate customizable decks

 – Minimal deck shuffling: cards come in a predictable queue, so you know how soon that much needed card will come into play

 – Three possible actions per card – more depth and decision freedom

 – Sci-fi world to with a personal story to discover
